name: Subtitle Workshop OCR Script
summary: Learn about .OCR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OCR scripts are written in a proprietary language that is similar to HTML. The scripts use regular expressions for text replacement.
NOTE: You can view the pre-installed Subtitle Workshop OCR scripts in the \​URUSoft\​Subtitle Workshop\​OCR Scripts\​ directory.

description: Script used by Subtitle Workshop, a movie subtitle editor; saves a list of find/replace value pairs that replace optical character recognition (OCR) errors with corrected text; used for making the subtitle text more accurate; can be used for multiple languages.
